name: GetTeamsIntegrationMappings
description:
Retrieve Teams integration mappings for an enterprise.

This tool retrieves a list of Teams integration mappings within a user's enterprise. It requires Admin or Co-Admin access to execute this call.

parameters.name: mapped_item_type
parameters.description: Specify the type of item ('channel' or 'team') for which the mapping should be returned.

value_schema.description: Mapped item type, for which the mapping should be returned.

parameters.name: mapped_item_id
parameters.description: The ID of the mapped item for which the mapping should be returned. Required for retrieving specific integration mappings.

value_schema.description:
ID of the mapped item,
for which the mapping should be returned.

parameters.name: box_item_id_for_mappings
parameters.description: The Box item ID to retrieve integration mappings for. Required for fetching specific mappings.

value_schema.description: Box item ID, for which the mappings should be returned.

parameters.name: box_item_type
parameters.description: Specify the type of Box item for which the mappings should be returned. Acceptable value is 'folder'.

value_schema.description:
Box item type, for
which the mappings should be returned.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the box API.

parameters.description: Mapped item type, for which the mapping should be returned.

for which the mapping should be returned.
